title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer

highlightedProject.title: WhatsApp Multi-Session Management Platform

Developed a modular React frontend with 40+ reusable components and optimized session handling UI.
Delivered a production-ready platform with health monitoring, structured logging, CI/CD pipelines, and Docker Compose orchestration.
